snippet: More than 130 C.E.O.’s stepped down from their posts in January. It may indicate better times for the corporate sector, as boards are more inclined to shuffle management when business is good.
abstract: More than 130 C.E.O.’s stepped down from their posts in January. It may indicate better times for the corporate sector, as boards are more inclined to shuffle management when business is good.

headline.main: Chief Executive Turnover High in January, Report Says
